testcase.name: TC01 Kullanici amazonda Nutella aratir
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici amazon anasayfaya gider.....................................passed When arama kutusuna Nutella yazip enter'a basar.............................passed And Arama sonuclarinin Nutella icerdigini test eder.........................passed Then Sayfayi kapatir........................................................passed
